data.name: War time CEOs' Strategies in Covid 19 Era
data.summary:
A Panel discussion comprising of distinguished & successful CEOs representing diverse industry sector on Strategies to be adopted by War Time CEOs to navigate through and to seize opptys in current times of Covid 19.
Perspectives for Startups, Incubators, Accelerators & Investors
data.speakers:
1. Arpit Aggarwal , Principal at Blume Ventures.
2. Satya Narayanan , Founder Career Launcher.
3. Rakshit Desai , MD Flight Centre Travel Group.
4. Rajat Agrawal , COO , Barista Coffee
5. Lloyd Mathias , Angel Investor & Business Leader
